meanings.sent1: The snowless ground looked brown and bare.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a snowless winter this year.
meanings.sent3: The snowless landscape made it easier to spot the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her snowless driveway was a clear path for the delivery truck.
meanings.sent5: The snowless mountains seemed lonely without their white blanket.

meanings.sent1: The snowless hills were green and lush in the spring.
meanings.sent2: We prefer a snowless Christmas for easier travel.
meanings.sent3: The snowless ski resort offered summer activities instead.
meanings.sent4: The snowless roof made it easier to spot any leaks.
meanings.sent5: The snowless fields stretched out endlessly under the clear sky.
